> One last thing, IF the Chivitron base has shields, are bots able to
> walk through them? I can't remember.
>
>

Typically if shields are up nothing gets in or out, at least on the show
shields had to be raised/lowered when you wanted in and out with most of the
base defenses being setup outside the shield perimeter allowing you to
protect your base and fire on opponents....some might have shields different
but if a shield will allow bots passage there's no reasonable explanation
why rockets can't pass through either ;)
